title.narrative: MODELS OF ECE AND ECI

description.narrative: Models of inclusive ECE services (equal accessibility and quality education) as well as integrated ECI policies (timely multidisciplinary and multisector intervention) are identified established, tested, documented and validated., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the Government implements appropriately resourced inclusive early childhood education (ECE) and multisectoral early childhood intervention (ECI) policies at national and subnational levels, with special focus on the most vulnerable children.

participating-org.narrative: MEDECINS DU MONDE ASBL DOKTERS VAN WERELD VZW

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) early-learning / pre-primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Models of inclusive ECE services (equal accessibility and quality education) as well as integrated ECI policies (timelymultidisciplinary and multisector intervention) are identified established, tested, documented and validated.

description.narrative: In 2021, the CO continued the successful implementation of;the EU-funded programme the Phase 3: Testing the Child Guarantee in Croatia, an integrated programme for tackling child poverty and exclusion. UNICEF;is testing comprehensive Early Childhood Intervention (ECI) and Early Childhood Education (ECE) approaches in Medjimurje County within the programme to ;demonstrate results on a small scale and;support the argument for future allocation of resources that would benefit the most marginalised children and families and enable them to come out of the cycle of poverty.;;;.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2022

title.narrative: Availably of integrated ECI models(52975), Text

actual.value: 2021:Testing of an ECI model initiated, 137 children aged 0-7 with or at risk of developmental delays or disabilities and 264 caregivers included in pilot and benefiting from provided ECI services.
